Articles.Content:
A buddy of mine told me about this game so I had to check it out, only problem is is when I open it is won't go back the loading page. I see Squad, then 3 aliens and loading loading loading and that is it. Any help would be great!

Peace.Love.Math

A buddy of mine told me about this game so I had to check it out, only problem is is when I open it is won't go back the loading page. I see Squad, then 3 aliens and loading loading loading and that is it. Any help would be great!

Peace.Love.Math

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Are you using any mods? You may need add KSP to your AV/Firewall (or you can modify the settings file to disable the update check).

You can also open a debug window(ALT-F2) to view messages that might help you determine what is wrong.

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky
